title: Suffolk County Police Department Officer W. Carroll BWC and Dashboard Camera of Traffic Stop at 8:45 PM on Monday, January 20, 2025

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am seeking any information in regards to departmental policy in regards to an officer identification  with the public furthermore, any policy in which the officer must state their name and badge identification number by the general public. In Addition, I am  seeking any department policy in regards to the body-worn camera, Bodycam (BWC), Dashboard Camera Traffic Stop or any recording device which may record audio or video from the 8:45 PM traffic stop on Old Town Road by Officer W. Carroll.

The requested documents are requested to prepare a legal defense to the several traffic violation, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert M. Scott

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Staff departures
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All staff hires and departures between Nov. 8, 2024 and Jan 21, 2025.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tonya Riley
